title: How Is This Happening
lyrics:
How is this happening?
How is this happening?
How we can't breathe?
How we can't see?
How is this happening?

How is this happening?

How we can't see?

How we can't feel?



I will take a deep breath with you

We have got a lot of work to do

Don't believe a single lie

They'll tell you so they will divide



Resisting him resisting us

Resisting him resisting us

I can't believe

I can't see



Our freedom isn't really free

Blooms with the blood of you and me

I'll fight until my days are done

Protect the ones he placed in power



Resisting him resisting us

Resisting him resisting us

How only we can see

How only we can breathe
